list.expr: {namespace="$namespace",container="eventrouter"} != "Preemption is not helpful" != "Failed deploy model" | logfmt | type="Warning"
list.name: K8s Warnings

targets.expr: sum by (state) (pyroscope_ring_members{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", name="distributor"}) / count by (state)(pyroscope_ring_members{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", name="distributor"})

panels.description: The ring is used by distributor to discover segment-writer instances.

targets.expr: sum by (state) (pyroscope_ring_members{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", name="segment-writer"}) / count by (state)(pyroscope_ring_members{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", name="segment-writer"})

panels.title: Segment Writer Ring

panels.description:
The latency observed by distributor, indicating the overall write path latency.

Only successful requests are counted.
panels.title: Latency

panels.description:
The latency observed by distributors (write path router), broken down by instance.

Latencies are expected to be distributed evenly across instances. An outlier here likely indicates a neighborhood issue.

Only successful requests are counted.
panels.title: Downstream Latency

panels.description: The latency observed by the segment-writer client
panels.title: Latency Heatmap

panels.description: The chart showd distribution of requests from the upstream (cortex-gw/envoy)
panels.title: Upstream Distribution

panels.description: The latency of the Push endpoint observed by segment-writer.

panels.description: The latency of the Push endpoint observed by segment-writer
panels.title: Latency Heatmap

panels.description: The latency segment-writer observes when uploading segments to object store, including retries.

panels.description: The latency of upload calls observed by the segment-writer

panels.description: The latency segment-writer observes when adding metadata entries to metastore, including retries.

panels.description: The latency segment-writer observes when adding metadata entries, including retries

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (irate(pyroscope_segment_writer_segment_ingest_bytes_sum{namespace="$namespace", container="segment-writer"}[10m])) /
sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container="segment-writer"}[10m]))
